title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Planning and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Planning and 

Development) (Renewable Energy) (No. 3) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation Planning 

and Development Regulations 2001 to 2025. 

Definition

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of giving further
heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2025” means the European Union
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2025” means the European Union 
(Planning and Development) (Renewable Energy) Regulations 2025 (S.I. No. 
274 of 2025). 

PART 2 

AMENDMENT OF REGULATIONS OF 2025 

Amendment of Regulation 38 of Regulations of 2025
text_norm: 2 regulation regulation 2025 mean european union (planning development) (renewable energy) regulation 2025 (s.i no 274 2025) part 2 amendment regulation 2025 amendment regulation 38 regulation 2025

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. Regulation 38(2) of the Regulations of 2025 is amended by the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 38(2) of the Regulations of 2025 is amended by the 

substitution of “1 May 2026” for “1 October 2025”. 

1 OJ L No. 328, 21.12.2018, p. 82. 
2 OJ L No. 2023/2413, 31.10.2023. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th September, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [435] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 September, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [435]

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of giving further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations, which came into operation on the date of their making by the 
Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage, amend paragraph (2) of 
Regulation 38 of the European Union (Planning and Development) (Renewable 
Energy) Regulations 2025 (S.I. No. 274 of 2025). 

 
 
 
 
 
 [435] 5
